column1: Little Goat Diner////We made a reservation so I'm not sure how long the regular wait would be. Looking at the menu I was a little apprehensive because the asian/ American diner fusion are so vastly different I didn't know if it was actually tasty or overhyped for its creativity/being the little sister of the Bib Gourmand rated restaurant The Girl & The Goat. Â The Hot Crab Dip is popular so we got that as the appetizer
column2: and the Shrimp and Pork Belly entree. Both were superb. We got these foods because we came for dinner but definitely would like to try their breakfast/other menu items- but based on my experience I think all of their food will be yummy despite how it might read on paper. Service was awesome too! Truly a 5 star experience.
